name: Flower Power (FuryGames, Zenko, Akyon, Cleiss)
description: To help the flower, we accompany its root in its growth so that it can recover the appearance it once had. There were days when people loved to see the charming, tiny flower, under the sun. There were days when it was complete, wonderful, in the breeze. Those days are not these days... but they could be again. “I wonder if I can recover my petal. Can you help me, my dear friend?”
